title: Mirkic7
author: Mirkic7
created_time: August 18, 2023, 01:23:23 PMLast edit: November 03, 2023, 07:41:53 AM by Mirkic7
content: List of threads:Announce | Bounty Social Media Campaign | Coming soon | About usBeta Testing - 20.00% - 100 000$Referral Program - 20.00% - 100 000$Social Media - 30.00% - 150 000$ (starts 22.08.2023)Ambassador Program - 20.00% - 100 000$We are hiring - 10.00% - 50 000$Eons - This exclusive poral contains NFTs of varying rarity levels. Each NFT is valued up to $1000!DNA - These assets act as the key to unlocking the Eon chest. With DNA in your possession, you gain access to the hidden treasures within, e.g. unique NFTs.Merch - The exclusive merchandise collection features a range of items, including mugs, sweatshirts, pens, caps, and more.Money - USDT and various other cryptocurrencies will be used for contest prizes and rewards for ambassadors.Exclusive Discord Role, Limited NFT and more.All participants must join the Eontribe's official Twitter, Telegram, DiscordBounty Campaigns are Beta Testing, Referral Program, Ambassador Program, We are hiring , and Social MediaOnly messages in the English language are permitted.Using multiple accounts, cheating and spamming are not allowed.Users with negative reputations are not eligible to participate in our bounty campaign.Impersonating others or using someone else's information in your reports will result in permanent banning.All participants must send the Proof of Authentication post and register on the form to join the bounty program.If you have not registered on the form, your answer will not be countedExample:Code:#Proof of authenticationJoined: *campaign name*Bitcointalk Username:Bitcointalk Profile Link:Telegram Username:Wallet address:General SpreadsheetRewardsEons with unique NFT up to 1000$DNARulesRead the General Rules First.Register on our Form and send the Proof of Authentication post.Join Eontribe Support group.Sign up to personal account on Eontribe Platform.Go to the Beta Testing tab and click on the "Join" button.Fill in your telegram nickname within the platform and wait for the email with instructions.Beta testing consists of the questions and activities that contribute to the training of our neural network.RewardsEon with unique NFT for each 2nd referral10% CashbackRules:Read the General Rules First.Register on our Form and send the Proof of Authentication post.Join Eontribe Support group.Sign up to personal account on Eontribe Platform.Go to the Referral tab and copy your unique Link.Send your referral link to your friends.When your friends sign up to our platform, you will receive a reward.RewardEons with unique NFTsDNAMerchMoneyLimited rewards and moreRulesRead the General Rules First.Register on our Form and send the Proof of Authentication post.Join Eontribe Support group.Sign up to personal account on Eontribe Platform.Go to the Ambassador tab and choose any task to do.Do the tasks and receive rewards.RewardsCompetitive weekly/monthly awards.We are looking for:Community managers (Spanish, Portuguese, Arabic {egyptian}, French, Mandarin Chinese, Vietnamese). Having a deep understanding of Web3, AI, social networking, and influence marketing is highly advantageous.Merchandise Logistics Coordinator.
